name: --color-black
description: Absolute black color.

name: --color-white
description: Absolute white color.

name: --color-gray-50
description: Very light gray, almost white. Used for backgrounds.

name: --color-gray-100
description: Light gray. Used for subtle backgrounds and borders.

name: --color-gray-200
description: Light gray. Used for UI elements like disabled buttons.

name: --color-gray-300
description: Gray. Used for borders and dividers.

name: --color-gray-400
description: Medium gray. Used for placeholder text and secondary icons.

name: --color-gray-500
description: Medium-dark gray. Used for secondary text.

name: --color-gray-600
description: Dark gray. Used for primary text in light themes.

name: --color-gray-700
description: Very dark gray. Used for headings and important text.

name: --color-gray-800
description: Almost black. Used for backgrounds in dark themes.

name: --color-gray-850
description: Slightly lighter than --color-gray-900. Used for secondary backgrounds in dark themes.

name: --color-gray-900
description: Very dark gray, near black. Used for main backgrounds in dark themes.

name: --color-gray-950
description: The darkest gray. Used for the outermost background in dark themes.

name: --color-blue-100
description: Very light blue. Used for highlights and subtle backgrounds.

name: --color-blue-200
description: Light blue. Used for hover states and highlights.

name: --color-blue-300
description: Blue. Used for secondary actions and links.

name: --color-blue-400
description: Bright blue. Used for primary actions and highlights.

name: --color-blue-500
description: Strong blue. Used for primary buttons and links.

name: --color-blue-600
description: The primary brand color. Used for major UI elements.

name: --color-blue-700
description: Dark blue. Used for hover states on primary elements.

name: --color-blue-800
description: Very dark blue. Used for visited links or pressed states.

name: --color-blue-900
description: Almost navy blue. Used for text on light blue backgrounds.

name: --color-blue-950
description: The darkest blue. Used for deep backgrounds or text.
